content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 quarts peanut oil for frying" )
( ing-2 "3 tablespoons coarse ground black pepper" )

content.text: 6 pounds beef ribs, cut into single rib pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "6 pounds beef ribs, cut into single rib pieces" )

content.text: 0) Heat the oil in a deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the oil"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a deep-fryer"@19:31 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@35:48 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@50:63 / TEMPERATURE )
		:_result ( heated-oil )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a medium bowl, mix together the salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic salt, and onion salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mix"@21:24 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the salt"@34:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "black pepper"@44:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cayenne pepper"@58:72 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "garlic salt"@74:85 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "onion salt"@91:101 / FOOD )
		:_result ( spice-mixture )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place the flour in a separate bowl or plate.
3) Whisk eggs in a large bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Whisk"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "eggs"@9:13 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a large bowl"@17:29 / TOOL )
		:_result ( whisked-eggs )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Rub the spice mixture onto all of the ribs.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Rub"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( spice-mixture "the spice mixture"@7:24 / FOOD )
		:gol ( ing-8 "all of the ribs"@30:45 / FOOD )
		:_result ( rubbed-ribs )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Dip each rib in egg, then in flour, then egg, then flour again.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Dip"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( rubbed-ribs "each rib"@7:15 / FOOD )
		:gol ( whisked-eggs "egg"@19:22 / FOOD )
		:gol ( placed-flour "flour"@32:37 / FOOD )
		:gol ( whisked-eggs "egg"@44:47 / FOOD )
		:gol ( placed-flour "flour"@54:59 / FOOD )
		:_result ( dipped-ribs )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Place the ribs in a fryer basket so they are not crowded, try 4 or 5 at a time depending on the size of your fryer.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( dipped-ribs "the ribs"@9:17 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "a fryer basket"@21:35 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-6-0 "so they are not crowded"@-1:-1 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( ribs-in-basket )
	)
)

( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "8 minutes"@18:27 / DUR )
		:ppt ( ribs-in-basket / FOOD )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
